column1: @entity1 liked going outside.  She put on her shoes. She went outside to walk.  She walked on the green grass.  The sun was warm.  The trees were tall. The birds sang in the trees. @entity1 liked how the birds can sing.  @entity1 likes to sing with the birds, outside.  Ring, ring, is how the birds sang. @entity1 sang ring, ring, with the birds in the trees. @entity1 took off her shoes.  @entity1 liked how the green grass was on her toes.  @entity1's toes liked the green grass.  @entity1 walked on the green grass some more.  She saw Missy the cat. Missy the cat meowed to @entity1.  @entity1 waved to Missy the cat.  @entity1 likes Missy the cat. @entity1 likes to meow to Missy the cat.  @entity0, meow, @entity1 says to Missy the cat. Missy the cat walks away from @entity1.  @entity1 hears her name.  @entity1, @entity1, come home, @entity1's Mom calls out.  @entity1 runs home to her Mom.  @entity1 liked going outside.
